## Projection.unprojectAltitude() method

Returns the altitude at the given world position (x,y,z) in meters.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
abstract unprojectAltitude(worldPoint: Vector3Like): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  worldPoint | [Vector3Like](./harp-geoutils.vector3like.md) | The position in world coordinates. |

<b>Returns:</b>

number
